code: import axios from'axios';import{disconnect}from'mongoose';import{GET_ITEMS,ADD_ITEM,DELETE_ITEM,ITEMS_LOADING}from'./types';export var getItems=function getItems(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get('/api/items').then(function(res){dispatch({type:GET_ITEMS,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/items/".concat(id)).then(function(res){if(res.data.success){dispatch({type:DELETE_ITEM,payload:id});}}).catch(function(e){return console.log("err");});};};export var addItem=function addItem(name){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/items',{name:name}).then(function(res){console.log(res);dispatch({type:ADD_ITEM,payload:res.data});});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
